priorVersion.title: CDISC ADaM Subject Trial Status Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C124296

self.title: CDISC ADaM Subject Trial Status Terminology

definition: Indicates the status of the subject in the trial.
name: Subject Trial Status
preferredTerm: CDISC ADaM Subject Trial Status Terminology

terms.definition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion. (NCI)
To stop or end, permanently or temporarily.
Remain in force or carry on without letup; keep or maintain in unaltered condition; exist in time or space without stop or interruption. (NCI)
